message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This would still give you a great deal, and it would be a fair compromise for me. Let me know your thoughts.
